author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Coimbatore Corporation will on January 22 meet corporate companies to explore the possibility of tapping their corporate social responsibility funds to aid the construction of toilets under the Swachh Bharat programme.

A release from the civic body said that the Central Government gives Rs. 4,000, State Government Rs. 2,000 and it chips with another Rs. 2,000 to the beneficiaries to help them construct individual household toilets.

Support

The corporate companies can support the effort by meeting the gaps the beneficiaries may face in completing the toilet construction.
title: Civic body to seek funds
